amendment.description: An amendment numbered 184 printed in Part D of House Report 117-241 to rescind U.S. participation in the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to rescind U.S. participation in the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A011) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 196 - 235 (Roll no. 27).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A011) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Perry.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A011) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 196 - 235 (Roll no. 27).
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A011) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 196 - 235 (Roll no. 27).
